stages.title: Define Your Education Vision
stages.description: Clarify your interests in teaching, educational policy, or educational research, and identify target universities.

Global.overview: Top education programs value genuine passion for teaching, leadership experience, and commitment to improving education.
checklist: Research 5-7 top education programs (Harvard GSE, Stanford, UCL, Cambridge, NUS)
Identify your interest (teaching, policy, research, administration)
Assess your teaching or tutoring experience
Create a 3-year roadmap connecting experiences, academics, and applications

US.overview: US programs emphasize teaching experience, leadership, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Research reach, target, and safety schools for education
Plan your Common App personal statement theme

UK.overview: UK programs prioritize A-levels, teaching experience, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Review entry requirements for UCL, Cambridge, Oxford education

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula with global standards.
checklist: Review education topics in national exams

quiz.q: What do top education programs value most?
opts: Genuine passion for teaching + leadership + teaching experience
quiz.correct: Genuine passion for teaching + leadership + teaching experience

stages.title: Gain Teaching & Leadership Experience
stages.description: Develop teaching skills and leadership through tutoring, volunteering, or educational initiatives.

Global.overview: Demonstrate education commitment through real teaching, tutoring, or educational leadership experiences.
checklist: Tutor peers or younger students regularly
Volunteer at schools, after-school programs, or educational nonprofits
Document your teaching experiences and reflections
projectIdeas: Start a tutoring program or club
Volunteer at local schools or libraries

US.overview: Link experiences to applications and programs.

UK.overview: Integrate experiences into EPQ or UCAS.
checklist: Draft EPQ proposal on education topic
Link teaching experiences to university themes

quiz.q: What's the best way to demonstrate education commitment?
opts: Teaching experience, tutoring, and educational leadership
quiz.correct: Teaching experience, tutoring, and educational leadership

stages.title: Strengthen Academic Foundation
stages.description: Excel in relevant coursework and develop understanding of educational theory.

Global.overview: Strong academic preparation and understanding of education is essential.
checklist: Participate in debate, leadership, or communication activities

quiz.q: What academic areas are most relevant for education?
opts: Strong general academics + psychology + communication skills
quiz.correct: Strong general academics + psychology + communication skills

stages.title: Craft Your Education Narrative
stages.description: Translate your teaching experiences and achievements into compelling applications.

Global.overview: Connect your education passion, teaching experiences, and achievements.
checklist: Get feedback from teachers or mentors
Draft Common App essay with education focus
Prepare statements for UCAS and Common App
Draft reflection on education career goals

quiz.q: What should your education personal statement highlight?
opts: Genuine passion for teaching, teaching experiences, and commitment to education
quiz.correct: Genuine passion for teaching, teaching experiences, and commitment to education

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish applications and prepare for interviews.

opts: Clear explanation of teaching experiences and passion for education
quiz.correct: Clear explanation of teaching experiences and passion for education
